SELECT a.ORG_CD, a.ORG_CLASS_CD, a.ORG_NM, a.ORG_ALIAS_NM, a.ORG_EN_NM, a.ORG_EN_ALIAS_NM, a.SORT_ORDER, a.ORG_LEVEL, COALESCE(( select b.ORG_NM FROM HM_ORGAN_BASIC b where b.ORG_CD = a.PARENT_ORG_CD ), 'Parent Category') as PARENT_ORG_NM , PARENT_ORG_CD , a.ORG_BOSS_EMP_CD, a.START_DATE, a.END_DATE, a.NOTE FROM HM_ORGAN_BASIC a where 1 = 1
and ORG_NM LIKE concat('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
and ORG_CD LIKE concat('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
and ORG_CD is not null
and PARENT_ORG_CD = #{CONTENT}
and ORG_CD is not null
and ORG_BOSS_EMP_CD = #{CONTENT}
ORDER BY ORG_CD
select ORG_CD, ORG_NM , COALESCE(( select b.ORG_NM FROM HM_ORGAN_BASIC b where b.ORG_CD = a.PARENT_ORG_CD ), 'Parent Category') as PARENT_ORG_NM , PARENT_ORG_CD from HM_ORGAN_BASIC a
